fields.name: eatAnimationTick
javadoc: Number of ticks since the entity started to eat grass

fields.name: level
javadoc: The world the grass eater entity is eating from

fields.name: mob
javadoc: The entity owner of this AITask

methods.name: canContinueToUse
javadoc: Returns whether an in-progress EntityAIBase should continue executing

methods.name: canUse
javadoc: Returns whether execution should begin. You can also read and cache any state necessary for execution in this method as well.

methods.name: getEatAnimationTick
javadoc: Number of ticks since the entity started to eat grass

methods.name: start
javadoc: Execute a one shot task or start executing a continuous task

methods.name: stop
javadoc: Reset the task's internal state. Called when this task is interrupted by another one

methods.name: tick
javadoc: Keep ticking a continuous task that has already been started
